page.title: 03BRISTOL HORFIELD PRISON
page.content: Horfield prison was opened in 1883.In 1967 and 1976 they added wings to the prison to make 572 cells. Now the prison can hold 669 prisoners including long term prisoners. These are the sort of jobs they do in prison, they have work from, post offices, hospitals, playgroups, Ministry of defence, private firms and manufacture clothing and equipment for prisoners. The majority of prisoners are employed on piece work, a few are paid on flat rate (they get paid on a weekly or monthly basis.) In prison you can take your O and A levels, so when you leave you have a better chance of a job. Now the Horfield prison is badly over_crowded and they are taking over some more premises in the area.The planned prisoner's hostel is causing concern among the residents.
